body.name: Bevel Shaving Cream for Men, Moisturizing Shave Cream with Aloe Vera and Vitamin E to Soothe Skin and Prevent Razor Bumps, 4 Fl Oz (Packaging May Vary)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 3 hrs 51 mins
features: Premium Quality - Bevel Shaving Cream for Men is crafted with the finest ingredients, including Aloe Vera, Shea Butter, and White Tea, providing you with a luxurious and moisturizing shaving experience.
Soothing Formula - Our shaving cream is specially formulated to soothe the skin, reducing irritation and preventing razor bumps for a smooth and comfortable shave every time.
Deep Hydration - Enriched with Aloe Vera and Shea Butter, our moisturizing shave cream deeply hydrates the skin, leaving it feeling soft, supple, and revitalized.
Nourishing Ingredients - Infused with the antioxidant properties of White Tea, our shaving cream helps protect your skin from environmental damage, promoting healthier-looking skin.

Compact and Convenient - With a 4 fl oz size, our Bevel Shaving Cream is travel-friendly, allowing you to maintain your grooming routine wherever you go. Enjoy the benefits of our premium formula on the go!
body.description: While other shaving creams rely on water as the key ingredient, The Bevel Shave Cream was uniquely formulated with a high concentration of ultra-moisturizing Aloe Vera to help your Bevel Razor glide effortlessly across your skin. Use along with the rest of the Bevel Shave System for a consistently smooth shave and clearer skin. The Bevel Shave System consists of The Bevel Razor, Bevel Badger Brush, Bevel Shave Cream, Bevel Priming Oil, Bevel Restoring Balm and Bevel Blades.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Bevel Difference Helps improve your skin’s ability to hold moisture to stay fresh and moisturized all day. Locks in moisture and restores hair strength without stripping hair of its natural oils. Helps reduce bumps, dark spots, and irritation for a fresher, healthier appearance. Moisturizes hair to help strengthen, nourish, and reduce breakage for a fuller beard.

Pre-Shave Oil Shave Cream Post-Shave Balm Safety Razor Shave Starter Kit Shave Kit Creates a lubricating layer to help reduce nicks and cuts ✓ ✓ ✓ Protect lather creates an ultra-moisturizing barrier to hydrate skin ✓ ✓ ✓ Helps instantly sooth and calm skin after shaves ✓ ✓ ✓ Exfoliates to remove dead skin ✓ Perfectly weighted to glide across skin ✓ The first end-to-end shave system for coarse and curly hair ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Dermatologist-tested, helps prevent razor bumps and irritation ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My new favorite shave cream. Works well an rinses off my face easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Low Foam but Great Shave (Updated)
reviews.reviewText: First I have to say that I could not get this cream to foam (see update below). I read reviews from other who couldn't either, so my suggestion is if foam is important to you, this may not be for you. The consistency was more of a cross between a shave cream and butter. That was a huge ding for me...but even with that I could not ignore the performance. So on to the performance...I have been wet shaving for about 3 years and have tried a variety of soaps, creams and butters. From the more pricy like AOS to the budget friendly Proraso. Some were ok and others were great. But Bevel is supreme in my opinion. My face never felt more moisturized and soft after the shave, which surprised me due to the lack of foam. As I mentioned earlier, I couldn't get it to foam and was worried that the cream was drying out and would provide a painful shave. That absolutely was not the case. I was using the Bevel DE razor so the combination of the two worked perfectly. In the end, as I rinsed by face/head, my skin felt very smooth and barely felt the need for aftershave. But I'm glad that I did follow up with the Bevel aftershave balm, first time using both, because that was the icing on the cake. I completed my shave with a great experience. I guess I'm becoming a wet shave hobbyist, a term that I thought was ridiculous when I first heard of it but here I am.The other ding I give it is the scent. One if the joys I get from wet shaving is the scents of the various soaps/creams/butters. This has a very light almost nonexistent scent. That being said, the performance outweighed all of my negatives by far. But it would be perfect if there were different scents and more foam, in my opinion. Nevertheless, providing a bump free smooth shave is far more important and that's where Bevel delivers. So far, I am impressed with every Bevel product that I have used.Update regarding the lather: I read reviews for their shave brush and some complained that is was a small brush. Immediately I thought that was the key to getting the cream to foam as my shave brushes are a little long. I think I was right. I purchased their brush and now I'm getting a decent lather. I still can't create a fully cloud of foam like some other soaps, but it's no longer like a butter and good enough to remove that complaint.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good shaving cream
reviews.reviewText: Works great for sensitive skin, clean shave with no irritation. Only downside is that, if you take a little too long, it gets incredibly sticky and annoying to get off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this shave cream! Nice lather and helps with a great shave. I will certainly buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great for my skin
reviews.reviewText: I have very curly hair with sensitive skin. Through years of using gels and not knowing what I was doing, razor bumps and ingrown hairs were a constant battle for me. This product lathers very well and works great with my hair type. Also, despite shaving with the grain I still get a close shave with this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Lathers up nicely doesn't dry out and a little goes a long way. Better than many others I've tried, including Creamo, which I like, too, but which doesn't lather well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars outstanding in every way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This shaving cream doesn’t lather up that much. You’ll have to use a large amount at a time just to see it on your skin. That leads to you nearly running through the entire bottle in a short time. I expected a better product especially at the price I paid for this. There’s better products being sold at better prices. I don’t recommend this.

As a Black American working abroad, I appreciate the effort and efficacy of this shaving cream. Today I opened this up and was a bit skeptical as I had thought my current shave gel (from another highly touted cream on Amazon).I was surprised, (1) the amount of lather I got from a mere drop of cream; (2) the lovely scent of the ingredients; (3) the feel or lack thereof from the razor gliding over my head (I use it for a bald shave). Now we'll see if it prevents razor bumps from amassing...something my other cream did not help with.
